topic.title: Millchan image board
topic.body: Check [/furry/ - board for furries](/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/1BM5oK5F2jpmoq2ZuKx912ZavrmmLPbuxP:furry:catalog) on Millchan (image board)

1535162782_1NVpW6BGgWn3oPYAjvsVjyHoBqApQ.body:
@pigpog you need either
A. to rework .js, sql, .json code of this forum or find someone who can do it so image uploading works
B. you need to use different content management system, example [Millchan](/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/) (already allows img/video upload)
C. modifying your zerotalk clone to allow at least embeding images, [check this comment](/1HMLvnRWViMnuvZc5LK4Dm86sZNcSH1jdh/?Topic:1526443011_1PniNzyi8fygvwyBaLpA9oBDVWZ5fXuJUw#comment_5_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS)
D. [ZeroBlog](/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1535186853_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS/ZeroBlog+clones+alternatives) support image upload

> [pigpog](#comment_2_1NVpW6BGgWn3oPYAjvsVjyHoBqApQpsJaP): I've got an idea: use base64, encoding it to "upload" and automatically decoding it as an image tag

interesting idea, maybe it would have less security issues than securing file upload, unsure, but bigger issue is that there is probably no programmer to implement it (unless you know or can find some).

1535486629_1NVpW6BGgWn3oPYAjvsVjyHoBqApQ.body:
Please create board on Millchan: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA
it will allow like minded people to gather in it and post their content on one place in topics.
